pages.text:
Membership
You do not have to be a member to enjoy Okeechobee Shooting Sports facilities- but membership does have its privileges.
Our membership packages are not just for individuals. We also have plans that include all family members living in the home, up to two adults and four children. Enjoy family time on the range. We also have membership packages for certified instructors to gain access to our facilities to offer their own training and instruction. And for those who want executive privileges, check out the options below.
We hope you take advantage of these key benefits such as extended shooting hours, preferred parking, discounts at the Pro-Shop and more. Choose the membership package that best fits you.
Don’t forget about our “Shooting Buddy” discount – receive a free One-Month extension for every shooting buddy you bring in that becomes a member.
Start your membership plan (or get one as a gift) today by filling out our simple Membership Agreement online (initial credit card payment must be made either in person or over the phone).
Contact our
Pro-shop
today be a part of the OKSS family.
(863) 357-3006
7055 NE 48TH ST
OKEECHOBEE, FL 34972

About us
Okeechobee Shooting Sports
is the greatest of its kind in south Florida – the ultimate shooting and gunsmithing destination featuring outdoor rifle and pistol ranges, 5 different Five-Stand fields, Trap, Skeet, and Steel Galleries.
It all began with a dream to build a shooting facility where shooters of all disciplines could enjoy the ultimate experience. A place that offered shooting sports, gunsmithing, instruction, firearms and shooting accessories, practice, and competition. And a place where shooters could have a great time with and get to know other people in the shooting community.
In 2009, the dream became a reality with the opening of
Okeechobee Shooting Sports
. The outdoor shooting facility welcomed a top-notch staff and range officers. We offer various shooting ranges including clays, pistol and long range rifle. We also have full service gunsmithing on premises, a Pro Shop, instruction, competitions, and much more. Today, hundreds of shooters enjoy this great place for shooting on a weekly basis. Guests utilize the wide selection of ranges that accommodate different shooting disciplines and activities designed with both the beginner and the long time shooter in mind. The environment is safe, family-oriented and equipped with all your shooting needs. It’s nearly 100 acres of shooting paradise. There’s great food available on-site, so there’s no need to bring your own.
Come on out and experience the greatest outdoor shooting facility in south Florida.
Located in beautiful Okeechobee County which is known for its many outdoor sports related activities. For those who enjoy an overnight stay, there is a campground on our property that hosts dry tent sites as well as RV sites with water and electric. All to make your time with us even better, including accessibility for all guests. It’s a short- but beautiful Florida country drive from many large airports and vacation destinations.
Take a look at some of our
Ranges
and
Clays
courses!
